file_content.text: It's high time you Republic agitators showed up! Toborro and his brutes have this entire facility captive. I was wondering if you'd ever bother liberating it.
Toborro's security grid is down. We're entering the main complex.
Once you've eliminated them and disabled any internal defenses, we will evacuate Sanctuary. Your heroics are most appreciated, and we will return the favor.
It is obvious you came for the illustrious Doctor Oggurobb. We are transmitting his coordinates so that you may quickly find him! Best of luck!
We're not getting a stable image on this end. Who are you, and how do you know us?
Identify yourself.
Please, call me Lippi. After all you've done to the Cartel, everyone on Makeb knows you.
The Republic sent me here to protect its people from a Hutt invasion. The word you're looking for is "defender."
I'm a hero, not an "agitator."
No offense intended. I'm confident you are quite the hero.
I'm not here to free anyone--unless by "liberate" you mean "throw in binder-cuffs and drag away for questioning."
We're here to capture someone.
Not everyone here serves Toborro willingly. This was an independent research facility before he blundered in.
There are many on this mesa being forced to work as slaves. We would be honored to aid your attack.
We possess detailed data on the lethal security grid Toborro installed across the mesa. We'll help you destroy it so you can enter the main complex and we can escape.
If you have information, now's the time to share it. Things are about to get loud.
All right, start talking.
If you know how everything works and you're on the inside, can't you deactivate the grid from there?
Why can't you do it?
Like my peers, I am confined to my laboratory. It required considerable ingenuity just slicing this comm channel.
The security grid doesn't matter. I'm after a target--and once I have him, I'm leaving.
I don't care about you people.
Not only will you find gaining entrance to the complex impossible, escaping with your prize will prove equally challenging. Listen to reason.
I am transmitting data on several key objectives. Each will provide you ample opportunity to convey your displeasure with Toborro. Stand by....
Follow those instructions precisely. You'll not only gain access to the main complex, you'll destroy Toborro's security grid. We'll speak again when you breach the main complex entrance.
Splendiferous! You've eliminated many of that bully's unforgiveably barbaric thugs, but more remain inside the complex.
